existing_features.title: Add three additional classic games to the app: Frogger, Galaga, and Minesweeper, each with a dedicated playable game page implemented in React/TypeScript and consistent UI/UX patterns (header back button, score panel, how-to-play panel, pause/reset controls where applicable, and end-of-game score submission dialog).

Update the frontend routing and navigation wiring so the new game pages are reachable from the home game grid and from the leaderboard page (including deep-linking to the leaderboard with a selected game).

Make the Leaderboard game list derive from the backendâ€™s available games (getAvailableGames) instead of a hard-coded constant, so newly added games automatically appear as tabs without additional code changes.
Add preview images for the new games as static assets and render them on the Home page game cards using the existing /assets/generated/* preview image convention.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add more classic games to the app

Extend the Motoko backend to recognize the new games (Frogger, Galaga, Minesweeper) in getAvailableGames() and to store/retrieve high scores for each via getHighScores(), getPlayerScore(), and submitScore() without trapping for these games.
